statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPBigtableClusterBackup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPBigtableCluster)<-[:Resource]-(:GCPBigtableInstance)<-[:Resource]-(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Bigtable Cluster Backup that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPBigtableClusterBackup)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPBigtableCluster)<-[:Resource]-(:GCPBigtableInstance)<-[:Resource]-(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPBigtableClusterBackup-to-Cluster relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPBigtableCluster)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPBigtableInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Bigtable Cluster that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPBigtableCluster)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPBigtableInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPBigtableCluster-to-Instance relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPBigtableTable)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPBigtableInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Bigtable Table that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPBigtableTable-to-Instance relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPBigtableInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Bigtable Instance that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPBigtableInstance)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPBigtableInstance-to-Project relationships that are out of date.
